thread.title: Congress invites Ghulam Ali to perform in Maharashtra
thread.title_full: Congress invites Ghulam Ali to perform in Maharashtra - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Congress invites Ghulam Ali to perform in Maharashtra
text:
After Shiv Sena scuttled his planned concert here, Congress in Maharashtra today invited the Pakistani Ghazal maestro Ghulam Ali to perform in the state.
READ : Pakistan singer Ghulam Ali's concerts in Mumbai, Pune called off over Sena protest
"MPCC has decided to invite Ghulam Ali to perform in the state. His fans are disappointed that his concert was cancelled," a party spokesperson said. "MPCC has written to Ghulam Ali requesting him to perform in Maharashtra. The party has asked him to convey time and place of his convenience," the spokesperson told reporters here.
For latest Music updates, follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
Shiv Sena, part of the ruling alliance in Maharashtra, forced organisers of Ali's concert here to cancel it two days ago. Sena is opposed to Pakistani artists performing in India. The governments of West Bengal and Delhi had yesterday offered to host Ali's concerts.
